subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: MATT RYAN, left, threw for 369 yards and 3 touchdowns as No. 15 Boston College got ready for the Atlantic Coast Conference title game by beating Miami for the first time since 1984.
snippet: MATT RYAN, left, threw for 369 yards and 3 touchdowns as No. 15 Boston College got ready for the Atlantic Coast Conference title game by beating Miami for the first time since 1984.
